name: Melting
description: Price begins at 0.01 XTZ and doubles after each purchase, ending at 5.12 XTZ. Created by @MathMakesArt on 2021/03/25. Generative geometric pattern animation using the phrase "melting" as input. Unlike my previous shorter animations, this NFT loops once every 3333 seconds. String-to-pixelart encoding scheme first displayed in my "25 Hashes" piece (https://www.hicetnunc.xyz/objkt/9953) and Twitter (https://twitter.com/mathMakesArt/status/1370339297279279107).
